title: I sexually identify as a gromp
body: Ever since I was a boy I dreamed of sitting in the corner spitting hot sticky poison on disgusting junglers. People say to me that a person being a gromp is Impossible and I’m fucking r%%%%%ed but I don’t care, I’m beautiful. I’m having a plastic surgeon install a long tongue, poison sacs and a tail on my body. From now on I want you guys to call me “Gromp” and respect my right to lick all over you and spit needlessly. If you can’t accept me you’re a ranidaphobe and need to check your jungler privilege. Thank you for being so understanding.
